hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik: The Prophet (ﷺ) said, If supper is served and the Iqama for (Isha) prayer is proclaimed, start with you supper first

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا حَضَرَ الْعَشَاءُ فَلاَ يَعْجَلْ عَنْ عَشَائِهِ
chapter.eng-name: If supper or dinner is served (when the time for Salat is due).
